name: Springy: A Bounce Adventure
description:
Springy: A Bounce Adventure is a Brazilian adventure and platform game set in the world of a cute little ball named Springy. Springy is a very kind and brave creature who is always willing to help his friends while trying to keep everything around him in perfect balance.

Don't forget to add it to your wish list: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1785230/Springy_A_Bounce_Adventure/

Characteristics:

Fully 3D Game:
Play with Springy in a fully 3D world with different challenges, difficulties, traps and find out who is responsible for all the odds.

Visual Cartoon Low Poly:
Enjoy the low poly cartoon look, with environments and objects rich in colors and simple details that make the game enjoyable to play.

Help Your Friends:
Interact with friendly characters and help them solve their problems, don't forget they also give you valuable tips.

Remember Classics:
Springy: A Bounce Adventure is based on classic games like Mario 64, Banjo-Kazooie, Crash Bandicoot, Bounce Boing Voyage, Bounce Touch and others.

What's Included in the Game:
The complete project initially has a quantity of 20 stages, with a huge possibility of extending to 30 stages depending on the acceptance of the game by the public.

Thank you very much for participating in this new experience, without you this project would not be possible.

Have a good game!!!

Obs: Please leave your feedback, any opinions are welcome.
